bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of a feeling of fear and restlessness in the heart without any apparent reason. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 12: 穀疸之狀，寒熱不食，食畢頭眩，心忪怫鬱不安而發黃 , “The appearance of grain dan -illness: [patients] experience alternating sensations of cold and heat and do not [wish to] eat. Following a meal, they develop head spin, with heart agitation , anger with pent-up [qi] and restlessness, and they develop a yellow complexion”.
